website_summaries.verdict: Definitely the best choice for skate shoes on the market right now. Their durability will end up saving you money in the long run.
pros: Tops the chart in almost every category, including comfort and support
Offers extra reinforcements including additional toe protection and a heavily padded tongue
cons: While these shoes can be a bit tight and stiff at first, they generally soften up and stretch out over time

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker over and over!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a creature of habit so its no surprise I have bought these shoes four times over because they fit me so well. I wear a size 13 so shopping in stores is a drag because when I see a wall of shoes and ask what they have in a 13 they point to two or three shoes. I've liked the DC Pure shoes since I was a kid and still wear them however instead of the crazy colors I now just opt for all black or grey ones ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Graham C.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small, Misleading Color
customer_reviews.text: The shoe turned out to be too small, I bought a size 10 but for this shoe it seems I would need a 10 wide. I was also disappointed by the color when opening it. I bought the battleship color, when I opened it the shoe laces seemed the same color as the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: New Fan of DC Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I have somewhat wide feet and these accommodate that without looking too bulky as some shoes do. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DimplesPalmer24

customer_reviews.title: terrible materials, falling apart after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 days of use the adhesive that keeps the fabric attached to the sole of the shoe is coming off. 3 DAYS OF USE and it's already falling apart, and I didn't even do much these 3 days, mostly sat around. DC uses the s*** quality materials, I', staying away from them on my next shoe purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: They have a pretty good reputation and are well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing skateboarding sneakers for a number of years now and this is the first time I've tried DC. They have a pretty good reputation and are well constructed. However, these sneakers HURT! Most skateboarding sneakers I've owned take a full day or two to break in. Two weeks of use later, they still leave your feet sore. These shoes, fit way too tight around the toes and put immense pressure on the pinky toe joint. I should have read other reviews more carefully and bought a pair one full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Al. T

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would be better than they are. The fit is a little small I'm a men size 12 and I think a 13 would have been better. No real arch support. The bed of the shoe is not that comfortable. Maybe they will be better once broken in. The style is nice though. I judge every shoe against the old Etnies Calicut. They would be perfect right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome service.... Shoes are brand new, clean all around.... Best place to get this kind of DCs... Especially since they don't have them in retail that much...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I though that size 12 was a Little big so ...
customer_reviews.text: I though that size 12 was a Little big so I try 11.5 and they are A little small after this in going back to 12s
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Liner Troubles
customer_reviews.text: The liner fabric of the insert has fallen off of both shoes after only 4 days of use. Not the worst problem, but now I either have to return the shoes or get new inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: DC Pure Men's Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got the all black ones. Very nice, classy look. They go great with a nice pair of blue jeans. I don't skateboard but wear them as an everyday shoe. Construction seems solid and durable. The sole is a little stiff at first making them slightly uncomfortable. However, after a solid week of wearing them everyday they are starting to break in nicely. They are super comfortable now. I actually ordered the black/green ones as well because the price for both pairs I got was about $20 less here on amazon for each pair than what I could find in a local store. Can't beat that. Very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better! Not D.C. Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a lot of DC shoes over the years and they are always comfortable and good quality so I didn't think twice about buying them. These shoes do not have the same quality by having no elastic bands to keep the tongue in place which I thought was standard in the better skate shoes. They came with one set of cheap small laces that looked like they were off a different pair of shoes. Not very comfortable like other DC's and tongue moves to the sides, so I used new nicer laces that I laced through the top tongue strap which helped.
customer_reviews.author: P&R

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been tired of shoes that fall apart and are poorly crafted, these shoes are above my expectations very solid feeling shoe does not look like they merely glue pieces of rubber to it like my last 3 Vans that fell apart on me early in their life, I can already tell these DC shoes will be winners. I will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Nitr0EngiEx

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: These are not very good looking and earned immediate ridicule from my wife. However, they are reasonably comfortable and meet my requirement of having a flat sole and holding well on flat platform bike pedals. Tough to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Prokopets

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are comfortable, durable if you use them for skating
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable, durable if you use them for skating, and one of DC's classics. For the people who say they're "a bit too small", its only because they're skate shoes and are packed with padding. For people who are moving from other brands such as Nike, Adidas, New Balance, etc. and buying skate shoes for the first time, I'd suggest going up a half to a whole size. Just know that once you start wearing skate shoes, you'll probably never be able to go back to other types of footwear :D
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Wells

customer_reviews.title: Multi
customer_reviews.text: DC SHOES are very comfortable.I purchase the multi love the summer colors ,shoe looks so much better than picture.They are true to size i wear 10 5 medium.DONT wait buy youself a pair your feet will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe for an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe's arrived when they were supposed to. Shoes are white and battleship gray. Good looking shoes and with a wet microfiber cloth, the continue to look good. I highly recommend if your looking for a nice athletic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Typical DC Shoes...AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of DC shoes and they never leave me wanting. These shoes are no exception. Super comfortable, exactly like the picture shown. Can't argue with perfection. A word to the wise, I wear size 10 but with DC I always go 9.5 DC sizes run a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: He has worn them for a few days now and has told me how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my son, he loves them. He has worn them for a few days now and has told me how comfortable they are. He loves the skater looking shoes. It is funny to watch him try and keep his new shoes looking clean and try not to get them dirty...lol. I. guess he really likes them. I would recommend these shoes if you are looking for an affordable comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jacques

customer_reviews.title: DC shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my teenage son as a gift. He loves them. They are true to size and he says they are quite comfortable. He did not like the laces that came with them but he since has replaced them and is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: aimee wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, easy to clean, made really well, great Street shoes. Laced up out of the box, very comfortable pay attention to size chart
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: DC Mens Pure Skate
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to find shoes that fit me at such an awesome price. I wear a US size 18 mens and im flatfooted, so basketball shoes dont work too well for me. but a friend told me they had size 17's in DC's and they usually run a little bigger than normal shoes so i tried them out. I love these shoes, they are durable, comfortable, and dont look bad either. And on top of that, if you wear larger sizes like i do the price tag is definitely appealing compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Flick

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy Insole
customer_reviews.text: First pair of my shoes were damaged a little bit and there was a discomfort (that i thought because of the damage) on the front side of the right shoe than i ordered a new pair and the same discomfort exists in the new shoe. The problem is there is a lump on the insole under the ball of right foot and that's not nice at all.
customer_reviews.author: hakank

customer_reviews.title: No wide widths
customer_reviews.text: I am not the only person in the world with wide feet and this brand with medium only does me no good. I won't rate them since I dont have them. Medium widths wont help me. colors are nice, shoe looks nice but sorry.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Getz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes on January 10 and today is January 26 and 8 have still yet to receive this product. Very disappointed. I normally love using Amazon and have no problems most the time but this one takes the cake. Definitely will not be buying from pipeline again.
customer_reviews.author: bob

product_meta.title: DC Men's Pure Skate Shoe
product_meta.description:
When you want to look good in a shoe that's actually made for your board, you know DC has your back, Pure and simple. With ample padding through the tongue and collar along with durable leather upper and a grippy rubber sole, this shoe is ready to perform. Distinctive logo detailing gives you the finish you want.

Dc recognizes the fusion between art and skateboarding, taking footwear to the next level. Delivering uncompromising comfort, durability, and eye-catching fashion, dc is the source for everyday and technical skateboarding footwear.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Lace-up leather sneaker with multiple brand callouts featuring padding at collar and drainage ports at medial side
Abrasion-resistant sticky rubber outsole. Upper: Leather / Lining: Textile / Outsole: Rubber.
